competitor_analysis_agent.description: An AI agent that performs comprehensive social media competitor analysis, analyzing platform presence, content strategy, engagement metrics, and providing strategic recommendations

facebook_scraper_agent.description: A social media scraper that scrapes Facebook posts and comments using the Graph API

instagram_scraper_agent.description: A social media scraper that scrapes Instagram posts and comments using the Graph API

facebook_sentiment_analysis_agent.description: A social media sentiment analysis agent that analyzes Facebook posts and comments using the OpenRouter API

instagram_sentiment_analysis_agent.description: A social media sentiment analysis agent that analyzes Instagram posts and comments using the OpenRouter API
